hymn.title: I just keep calling, O Lord
hymn.category: Comfort in Trials—By the Lord's Name

layout.singingstanza: I just keep call -- ing, "O Lord!" As I walk a -- long; I just keep call -- ing, "O Lord" And He gives a song. Though the storm clouds dark -- en the sky, O'er the up -- ward trail; I just keep call -- ing, "O Lord"; He will nev -- er fail. He's a faith -- ful friend, Such a faith -- ful friend; I can count on Him To the ver -- y end. Though the storm clouds dark -- en the sky, O'er the up -- ward trail; I just keep call -- ing, "O Lord" He will nev -- er fail.
